title: Ep 324 | Miss Kay Gets Sassy with Jase & Jase Makes People Want to Beat the Daylights Out of Him
description:
Jase and Miss Kay explain Phil’s unusual way of dealing with traumatic and serious situations. Jase and Al are joined by Miss Kay and their Aunt Ann to talk about their childhood and what it was like to grow up in rural Louisiana. Jase describes his many near death experiences, including a car wreck that he thought sent him to hell. Miss Kay recalls Phil's words to her after she woke up on a ventilator after life-threatening surgery. Jase relives the time he got shot in the head by a trash fire. And Al remembers the many times Jase and Willie were punished even though he intentionally started the trouble.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
